short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows accepting a random challenge on Lichess.org, filtered by time control.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An updated version of Simon Lammer's original extension allowing people to accept a random challenge on Lichess. The ability to filter by time control has been added.
